Presentaciones

    Husserl-Archiv Köln
    “Monadologie und Einfühlung in Husserls Phänomenologie“, en Phänomenologische Werkstatt, Forschungskolloquium für Promovierende und Gastwissenschaftler:innen
  • 25/01/2022
    Institutio de Psicologia da Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro (IP/UFRJ), Brasil

    Center of Philosophy, School of Arts and Humanities, University of Lisbon, Lisboa, Portugal
    The Three Conceptions of Empathy in Husserl’s Phenomenology”, en Sympatheia, Einfühlung, Empathy: Understanding and Feeling Others
  • 4-5/10/2019
    Graz, Austria
    “Attempt at a systematic presentation of the phenomenological theory of empathy. Re-Reading Husserl and Stein”, en Phenomenological Perspectives on Empathy and the Significance of Empirical Research. Women in Phenomenology: Edith Stein
  • 26-28/09/2019
    Bucarest, Rumania
    “The Three Dimensions of the I and its Three Sciences. Where does the Body-Soul belong?”, en The 5th Conference on Traditions and Perspectives of the Phenomenological Movement in Central and Eastern Europe: Shifting Roles. The Manifold Identities of Phenomenology
  • 18-21/09/2019
    Viena, Austria
    “Dimensionen der alltäglichen Einfühlung in der Umständlichkeit“, en DGPF-Tagung 2019: Faktum, Faktizität, Wirklichkeit: Phänomenologische Perspektive
  • 2-6/09/2019
    Varsovia, Polonia
    “Husserl’s Theory of Empathy and the Role of Language”, en 2nd Research Summer School in Genetic Phenomenology, Limit Problems of Phenomenology: The Unconscious, Instincts, Metaphysics, and Ethics
  • 27-29/06/2019
    Gotinga, Alemania
    “The Different Dimensions of the Experience of the Other: a Phenomenological Theory of Empathy”, en 3rd Göttingen-Lepizig-Chicago Graduate Conference
  • 01-03/03/2019
    Blagoevgrad, Bulgaria
    “Living in a Marxist Sci-fi world: A Phenomenological Analysis of the Power of Science-Fiction in Le Guin’s ‘The Dispossessed’”, en 2nd Science Fiction and Communism Conference
  • 18-20/10/2018
    Colonia, Alemania
    “Empathie und Perversion: Versuch einer phänomenologischen Fundierung einiger psychoanalytischen Begriffe” (“Empatía y perversión: intento de una fundamentación fenomenológica de algunos conceptos psicoanalíticos”), en Husserls Arbeitstage
  • 12-13/10/2018
    Kaunas, Lituania
    “The levels of the Empathic Experience and Empathy as a Know-how. What enables us to be Experts at empathizing?”, en Phenomenology of Emotions, The 4th Conference on Traditions and Perspectives of the Phenomenological Movement in Central and Eastern Europe
  • 4-5/10/2018

  • 18-20/06/2018
    Gotinga, Alemania
    “Phenomenological Empathy vs. cognitive Mind-reading. A Defense of a transcendental Approach to the Experience of Others”, en 2nd Chicago / Göttingen / Leipzig Graduate Student Conference

    Brussels Free University, Belgium
    “The possibility of a new metaphysics for QM from the phenomenological perspective: Meinong and Husserl”, en Quantum Mechanics and Quantum Information: Physical, Philosophical and Logical Perspectives

    Los Cocos, Córdoba, Argentina

    Montevideo, Uruguay
